name: Southridge Investment Group
overview: Southridge Investment Group LLC provides investment banking and securities brokerage services. The firm offers mergers and acquisitions, restructuring, valuations, fairness opinions, private placements, and recapitalizations advisory services. Additionally, it owns and operates an online sales and trading platform for fixed income, credit, and structures products. Southridge Investment Group LLC is based in Ridgefield, Connecticut.
